newsitem.title: USA: Cerus starts trial of plasma system.
newsitem.headline: Cerus starts trial of plasma system.

text.p: Cerus Corp said it has started a Phase I clinical trial to test the safety and tolerability of its photochemical system for inactivation of pathogens in plasma used for transfusion.
Assuming satisfactory completion of the trial, it said it plans to begin efficacy studies in early 1988.
Cerus said preclinical studies showed its compounds inactivated a wide range of pathogens, such as HIV, hepatitis B and C.
